entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
